channel.title: Help needed (errors)
channel.description:
i've been trying to make a server in hopes to learn how to code. I've tried a few different sources and none seem to work. i figured out part of my error was that i needed to change the file destination in the runserver.bat to fit my current version of Java. however, this did not fix my problem entirely. The first one, Jagex-scape (might as well give credit to the original owner) doesn't really give me errors but when i run the client it can't connect which makes me think something's wrong.
http://s1235.photobucket.com/albums/ff440/kingandy1/?action=view&current=NewPicture1-1.png
the second source CorruptionX gives me an unknown source error which you can check out by following the link below.
http://s1235.photobucket.com/albums/ff440/kingandy1/?action=view&current=NewPicture-2.png
one last thing (not related to the topic in any way) anyone have any tips for learning how to code a 562 rsps? I'm hoping to eventually open my own server.
Thanks, any help will be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Help needed (errors)
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Doesn’t matter as long as it’s not JDK 7 and to upgrade Xstream you would need to upgrade it to the Java 7 version.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed (errors)
item.dc:creator: @kingandy1 kingandy1
item.description:
@kingandy1 wrote:

expand on this. It is my first time creating a rsps and it’s time for a bit of spoon feeding :). which one are you refering to when u say this? How do you upgrade your xstream or what version of java do i need to downgrade to?

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed (errors)
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You need to downgrade in JDK or upgrade your XStream.

Read full topic
